Spring-Mass data from Vernier
========================================================
Tim and Danny

```r
require(mosaic)
```

```{r}
spring = read.csv("Topics/SpringMass/SpringVernier.csv")
plotPoints( pos ~ time, data=spring)
posfun = fitModel( pos ~ A*sin(2*pi*(time-T0)/P) + B,
  start=list(P=2*pi/11,T0=-.65,B=.72,A=.02), data=spring)
plotFun( posfun(t)~t, add=TRUE)
```

```{r}
vel = numD(posfun(t)~t)
accel = numD(vel(t)~t)
plotFun(accel(t)~t, t.lim=c(0,5))
plotFun(vel(t)~t, add=TRUE,col="green")
plotFun(posfun(t)~t, add=TRUE, col="red")
```

Calculate simple derivatives numerically:
```{r}
vdata = c(NA,with(spring,diff(pos)/diff(time)))
adata = c(NA,with(spring,diff(vdata)/diff(time)))
plotPoints(vdata~time, data=spring,add=TRUE,col="green")
plotPoints(adata~time, data=spring,add=TRUE, col="blue")
